text: Mohd Shahrul Bin Chankui (born 9 November 1990) is a Malaysian footballer. He was a midfielder for Sabah FA in the Malaysia Premier League in 2014 . He is from Beluran Sabah Malaysia. ==Early life== Chankui started his Youth football career with Sandakan FA and Beluran FA in 2008 for Chief Minister Cup Sabah . After that he joined Sabah Youth. ==Career== Chankui started his professional football career with Sabah during the 2014 season. He played 6 matches during Malaysia Premier I League.http://www.sabahfa.com Milomir Šešlija, the State Sabah team coach at that time, took him into the senior team. He debuted in a match against Felda United FC Malaysia Premier League. At the end of the 2014 season, Sabah FA officially released him. From 2015-2016, he joined DYS F.C. for Malaysia FAM League third division for Malaysian League. ==References== == External links == * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Malaysian footballers Category:Sabah FA players Category:People from Sabah Category:Association football midfielders Category:Association football defenders
title: Mohd Shahrul Chankui
